import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";import boxShadows from"assets/theme/base/boxShadows";// Soft UI Dashboard PRO React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";var grey=colors.grey,white=colors.white;var borderRadius=borders.borderRadius;var tabsBoxShadow=boxShadows.tabsBoxShadow;export default{styleOverrides:{root:{position:"relative",backgroundColor:grey[100],borderRadius:borderRadius.lg,minHeight:"unset",padding:pxToRem(4)},flexContainer:{height:"100%",position:"relative",zIndex:10},fixed:{overflow:"unset !important",overflowX:"unset !important"},vertical:{"& .MuiTabs-indicator":{width:"100%"}},indicator:{height:"100%",borderRadius:borderRadius.md,backgroundColor:white.main,boxShadow:tabsBoxShadow.indicator,transition:"all 500ms ease"}}};
